MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL62 and LL65 postcode areas of Bodorgan and Holyhead affecting a small number of properties in the local area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm in order to carry out repair work in safety on the overhead line network , and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:13pm on the 7th January 2021.
